thread.title: Suite with kitchen
thread.title_full: Suite with kitchen - Review of Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Petrotravellers
title: Suite with kitchen
text: We stayed here for six nights and it was nice to have a more spacious room in New York by their standards. Also the fact that there was a small kitchen with dishwasher fridge and microwave and stove top helped as we prepared a couple of meals and were able to use those facilities for the children. I am not a huge fan of the breakfast but I guess it is convenient for children and families and anyone really because it gets a jumpstart on your day which is important in a city like New York. Alas for me quality trumps quantity all the time. Should my family and I be in New York again we would definitely consider staying here.
